Text:
Initially very watchable, but when they meet laurence fishbourne it goes out of focus so badly you literally are just listening to what is happening - utter garbage copy.

Sound - 8/10 pretty good
Video - 2/10 VERY badly out of focus
Movie - 8/10 what I saw of it looked really good and one of the better Predator movies

DIRTY THIEF

You're taking credit for someones work

The Mods ought to take away your Skull
